SEARCH
Package Models

Class Connection

java.lang.Object
Models.Connection
public class Connection extends Object
Connection represents a link between two rooms in the game map, allowing player movement between connected rooms. Each connection can be locked and may require a specific item as a key to unlock and traverse.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Connection(Room from, Room to, boolean isLocked, Item key)
    Creates a new Connection between two rooms with a locked state and an optional key item.

  • Constructor Details

    • Connection

      public Connection(Room from, Room to, boolean isLocked, Item key)
      Creates a new Connection between two rooms with a locked state and an optional key item.
      Parameters:
      from - the room where the connection starts
      to - the room where the connection leads
      isLocked - true if the connection is locked, false otherwise
      key - the item required to unlock this connection, or null if no key is needed

  • Method Details

    • getFrom

      public Room getFrom()
      Returns the room where this connection starts.
      Returns:
      the source room of the connection

    • getTo

      public Room getTo()
      Returns the room where this connection leads.
      Returns:
      the destination room of the connection

    • isLocked

      public boolean isLocked()
      Returns whether this connection is currently locked.
      Returns:
      true if the connection is locked, false otherwise

    • setLocked

      public void setLocked(boolean locked)
      Sets the locked state of this connection.
      Parameters:
      locked - true to lock the connection, false to unlock it

    • getKey

      public Item getKey()
      Returns the item that serves as a key to unlock this connection.
      Returns:
      the key item, or null if no key is required
